Title: Veritas Kapital to raise N15 billion
Summary: Veritas Kapital Assurance has unveiled plans to raise N15 billion in fresh capital through a private placement . The plans are subject to the approval of its shareholders at the company’s upcoming 48th yearly general meeting .

Title: Cargo clearance inefficiencies cost Nigeria N900b yearly, SEREC declares
Summary: Cargo clearance system inefficiency at the ports is costing Nigeria between N500 billion and N900 billion yearly in unrealised revenue, administrative duplication and lost productivity . The Sea Empowerment and Research Centre (SEREC) declares .

Title: Experts decry worsening mental health crisis due to frequent disasters
Summary: Experts decry worsening mental health crisis due to frequent disasters . Millions of citizens continue to face deep mental health consequences following recurring floods, building collapses, insecurity and other disasters .

Title: German envoy calls for stronger ties with Nigeria
Summary: German Consul-General Daniel Krull, in Lagos, has called for stronger German-Nigeria cooperation . The 35th anniversary of German reunification marks the anniversary of reunification, themed, "Future Through Change: Celebrating What Unites Us" The envoy calls for stronger ties with Nigeria .

Title: Foreign airlines breach NCAA regulation with city ticketing offices
Summary: Some airlines operating in Nigeria have continued to run ticketing and sales offices in cities across the country . This is despite regulations by the Nigeria Civil Aviation Authority (NCAA) prohibiting such operations . Foreign airlines breach NCAA regulation with city ticketing offices .

Title: Dollar to Naira exchange rate today, October 13, 2025
Summary: The Nigerian Foreign Exchange Market (NFEM) opened at about ₦1,462.50 per US dollar on October 13, according to market data tracking services .

Title: Hamas hands over 7 Israeli hostages to Red Cross
Summary: The Gaza peace deal hinges on both sides adhering to an agreement to exchange hostages seized from Israel in Hamas's October 7, 2023 attack .

Title: I’m going blind, native doctor cries out from detention
Summary: Anambra native doctor, Chidozie Nwangwu, popularly known as Akwa Okuko Tiwa Aki, has been detained . The spiritualist is going blind while in detention, his associate says . The associate, who requested anonymity, said she recently spoke with him from an undisclosed detention .

Title: US genocide debate sparked by FG’s failures
Summary: Dr. Gbenga Hashim berated the federal government over what he described as its “shamefully political and dangerously unserious” The former presidential candidate and PDP, chieftain, described it as 'dangerously unserious'

Title: UK steel industry set for worst crisis as EU hikes tariffs
Summary: EU's decision to hike steel tariffs and sharply cut import quotas has provoked widespread concern in the UK . The bloc announced plans to reduce tariff-free quotas on imported steel – proposing a reduction of 47% compared to 2024 steel quotas .
